name: 01-recipe-building-web-app-w-express
description: [Express.js](http://www.expressjs.com) or Express, has been and remains the most popular web framework for building web applications in Node.js. Express was one of the first Node.js web frameworks and was based on the **Sinatra** web framework for **Ruby and Rails**. Express.js was a project of the [**OpenJS Foundation**](http://www.openjsf.org/projects/), and previously the Node.js Foundation.js.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
